metadata.title: CVE-2024-42143 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Rejected reason: This CVE ID has been rejected or withdrawn by its CVENumbering Authority.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
